description: Articles and videos from The NY Times on student loans, including information on federal college and university loans, Sallie Mae, private loans, co-signers, and loan consolidations.
title: Your Money - Student Loans
title_page: Your Money - Student Loans - The New York Times
text: So what is going on with student loans? With the current credit crisis, many lenders have tightened their credit standards, leaving only government loans available. Even more than in years past, it's important that students and their parents plan carefully and figure out what they need – not want — to borrow.
